p:
Cindric et al. obtained carboxamide containing benzothiazole by the condensation of substituted thiophenes and substituted amino-BTAs to prepare the desired product and studied their anticancer activity against MCF-7 cell line. The benzothiophene based carboxamide chloroaminobenzothiazole 59 ( Figure 36) exhibited potent anticancer activity with an IC 50 of 40 nM
59 .
